data.oai_dc:dc: Crustacea, Species diversity, Macrofauna, Yucatan, Peracarida, Benthos, Tropical, Amphipoda, Coral Reef|Occurrence

The dataset contains information about records of benthic amphipod crustaceans collected in the Alacranes Reef, southern Gulf of Mexico, during the years 2009 - 2011.The identified material form part of the crustacean regional collection from the UNAM-Sisal, and represents the first inventory of amphipods from the Alacranes Reef National Park.|588 occurrences
